email_body: Credit lines are like bandwidth. Create the capacity and we'll find a way to use it. Sarah Wesner@ENRON 10/03/2000 09:58 AM To: John Arnold/HOU/ECT@ECT cc: Subject: ABN John - Enron maxed out its facility with ABN on 9/18/00. I am going for an increase to $50 million. Do you see increasing your trade flow? I do not want to ask for interest free money if Enron will not use it. Sarah
